The premise is, I go to
a healing center to

just completely discard of
any energy from past relationships.

Although it's really
hard to do,

because when you're in
a relationship that's real,

they end up taking
a piece of you,

and you can never freaking
get that piece back.

But I'm about to enter
through the healing gates.
And try and find that piece again.

It's kind of like a cult,
but it's not.

hypnotherapy ♪
♪ I gotta rewire this brain ♪
Ok-ok. OK!

We're going to participate

to hopefully get
that healing.

and water our hearts.

We are going to do

with dancing and
partnership.
